summary: Not just another Item Sorting mod
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-7.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1089738-1333641782.png[/img][/center]


[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1089738-1333642086.png[/img]

[list][*]It takes advantage of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4873]Valdacil's Categories[/url]; opposed to Better Sorting.[*]All-in-one esp.[*]Fully compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862]Categorized Favorites Menu[/url][*]Fully compatible with the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=19]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url].[*]Fully compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10891]Unlimited Bookshelves[/url] through a replacement esp.[*]Supported by BOSS.[*]Weight adjustments for many quest items (most are 0, since you can't remove them until the corrsponding quest is finished)[*]Slight weight adjustments for many items (like spoons don't weigh 0,5 - they weigh now 0,1).[*]All basic categories are covered, except Ingredients. For Soul Gems I highly recommend my other mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6335]Soul Gems Differ[/url], the most customizable Soul Gems on the net. [*]Optional progressiv Potions and Poisons. While maintaining the lorefriendliness, you will have now more reason to invest in Alchemy, which thus becomes more rewarding. Furthermore, poisons are extracts, and therefore must weigh less then potions.Progression Curves:[u]Poisons[/u]Level I : Weight = 0,3Level II: Weight = 0,25Level III & IV: Weight = 0,2Level V: Weight = 0,15[u]Fortify[/u] Level I : Weight = 0,6Level II: Weight = 0,55Level III & IV: Weight = 0,5Level V: Weight = 0,4[u]Resist[/u] Have not been touched.[u]Restore[/u] Level I : Weight = 0,6Level II: Weight = 0,55Level III & IV: Weight = 0,5Level V: Weight = 0,45Level VI: Weight = 0,4[u]Thievesguild Potions[/u] Level I : Weight = 0,65Level II: Weight = 0,6Level III & IV: Weight = 0,55Level V: Weight = 0,5Level VI: Weight = 0,45[*]Note: If you're looking for weightless items, you'll have to go else where. I like to keep it as lorefriendly as possible.[/list]


[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1089738-1333642795.png[/img]

Just drop esp. into Data/

Suggested Loadoder:


[b]Utopolyst's Item Sorting.esp[/b]
SOME KIND OF WEAPON AND ARMOR.esp
Smithing Perks Overhaul - Balanced.esp
Weapons and Armor fixes.esp
Weapons and Armor fixes - Hacks.esp
...
UnlimitedBookshelves.esp

or:

[b]Utopolyst's Item Sorting.esp[/b]
SOME KIND OF WEAPON AND ARMOR.esp
Some kind of Smithing or Enchanting.esp
...
UnlimitedBookshelves.esp


[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1089738-1333643531.png[/img]

Just delete esp. from Data/






[b]A thank you goes out to:[/b]

- Valdacil for his inspirational sorting categories
- Kivan for all the work with USKP
